channel.title: Betcha didn't know this!
channel.description:
I found out where from Valve pulled out the name "Black Mesa" and probably "Half Life".
I was watching the sky through my...eyes..., drawing down stars and looking them up in Stellarium. Now, in the Orion constellation, on the Hunter's "neck"(a bit higher from Betelgeuse and Bellatrix) there's this small star bears the name "Lambda Orionis". [img]https://img52.imageshack.us/img52/3663/1029201085303am11820106.jpg[/img] Here's a quote from Wikipedia: [quote] "Lambda Orionis (λ Ori, λ Orionis) is a star in the constellation Orion. It has the traditional names Meissa or Heka. "Meissa" derives from the Arabic "Al-Maisan" which means "[b]The Shining One[/b]" [/quote] Does "λ" sounds/looks familiar to you? Does Meissa(pronounced "Mesa") ring a bell?
I bet that's another source from which Valve got those names from. And there's also this...irony? "Black Mesa" which would kind of mean "Black Shining".
This goes to Gabe so I can get a confirmation.

item.title: Betcha didn't know this!
item.dc:creator: Dias
item.description:
A while ago I found out that the Japanese character 入 means: enter, which is a funny coincidence because they’re often used to mark the entrances to resistance caches.

Read full topic

item.title: Betcha didn't know this!
item.dc:creator: SkyNinja
item.description:
Or how often they’re “accidentally” dropping EP3 content into various destructive situations, such as the only disk containing the code for Advisor battles mysteriously falling into a blendtec. I just successfully pushed EP3 back another three weeks, I do believe.

item.title: Betcha didn't know this!
item.dc:creator: GothicFighter
item.description:
Imonfire:

Well you sound fat.

only that I’m skinny:aah:

Jotie:

Yeah right, I’m the idiot here…

If you don’t believe his theory, you could have just said it like a normal person, guess that isn’t really the way things go around here.

You’ll get used to it after a while.
And after a bit longer you’re gonna do just like him, and another n00b is gonna come to the forums, post stupid threads, you’ll flame him, and he’s gonna say what you said. After a while he’ll get used to it. And after a bit longer he’s…:zip:
You get the point.

What I’ve meant to say(yea sure) is that this is a coincidence. Someone in the Steam forums said that that could be the Combine’s Homeworld(not likely because there’s no planet the but who knows.)

Read full topic
